00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.ComputedDateValue;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.ComputedNumericValue;
00006 import liquibase.util.ISODateFormat;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00010 
00011 import java.text.NumberFormat;
00012 import java.text.ParseException;
00013 import java.util.Date;
00014 
00020 public class ColumnConfig {
00021     private String name;
00022     private String type;
00023     private String value;
00024     private Number valueNumeric;
00025     private Date valueDate;
00026     private Boolean valueBoolean;
00027 
00028     private String defaultValue;
00029     private Number defaultValueNumeric;
00030     private Date defaultValueDate;
00031     private Boolean defaultValueBoolean;
00032 
00033     private ConstraintsConfig constraints;
00034     private Boolean autoIncrement;
00035 
00036     public String getName() {
00037         return name;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setName(String name) {
00041         this.name = name;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getType() {
00045         return type;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setType(String type) {
00049         this.type = type;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public String getValue() {
00053         return value;
00054     }
00055 
00056 
00057     public void setValue(String value) {
00058         // Since we have two rules for the value it can either be specifed as an attribute
00059         // or as the tag body in case of long values then the check is necessary so that it
00060         // should not override the value specifed as an attribute.
00061         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(value) != null) {
00062             this.value = value;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 
00066     public Number getValueNumeric() {
00067         return valueNumeric;
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     public void setValueNumeric(String valueNumeric) throws ParseException {
00072         if (valueNumeric == null) {
00073             this.valueNumeric = null;
00074         } else {
00075             if (valueNumeric.matches("\\d+\\.?\\d*")) {
00076                 this.valueNumeric = NumberFormat.getInstance().parse(valueNumeric);
00077             } else {
00078                 this.valueNumeric = new ComputedNumericValue(valueNumeric);
00079             }
00080         }
00081     }
00082 
00083     public void setValueNumeric(Number valueNumeric) {
00084         this.valueNumeric = valueNumeric;
00085     }
00086 
00087     public Boolean getValueBoolean() {
00088         return valueBoolean;
00089     }
00090 
00091     public void setValueBoolean(Boolean valueBoolean) {
00092         this.valueBoolean = valueBoolean;
00093     }
00094 
00095     public Date getValueDate() {
00096         return valueDate;
00097     }
00098 
00099     public void setValueDate(Date valueDate) {
00100         this.valueDate = valueDate;
00101     }
00102 
00103     public void setValueDate(String valueDate) {
00104         try {
00105             this.valueDate = new ISODateFormat().parse(valueDate);
00106         } catch (ParseException e) {
00107             //probably a function
00108             this.valueDate = new ComputedDateValue(valueDate);
00109         }
00110     }
00111 
00112     public Object getValueObject() {
00113         if (getValue() != null) {
00114             return getValue();
00115         } else if (getValueBoolean() != null) {
00116             return getValueBoolean();
00117         } else if (getValueNumeric() != null) {
00118             return getValueNumeric();
00119         } else if (getValueDate() != null) {
00120             return getValueDate();
00121         }
00122         return null;
00123     }
00124 
00125 
00126     public String getDefaultValue() {
00127         return defaultValue;
00128     }
00129 
00130     public void setDefaultValue(String defaultValue) {
00131         this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     public Number getDefaultValueNumeric() {
00136         return defaultValueNumeric;
00137     }
00138 
00139     public void setDefaultValueNumeric(Number defaultValueNumeric) {
00140         this.defaultValueNumeric = defaultValueNumeric;
00141     }
00142 
00143     public void setDefaultValueNumeric(String defaultValueNumeric) throws ParseException {
00144         if (defaultValueNumeric == null) {
00145             this.defaultValueNumeric = null;
00146         } else {
00147             if ("GENERATED_BY_DEFAULT".equals(defaultValueNumeric)) {
00148                 setAutoIncrement(true);
00149             } else {
00150                 this.defaultValueNumeric = NumberFormat.getInstance().parse(defaultValueNumeric);
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     public Date getDefaultValueDate() {
00156         return defaultValueDate;
00157     }
00158 
00159     public void setDefaultValueDate(String defaultValueDate) {
00160         try {
00161             this.defaultValueDate = new ISODateFormat().parse(defaultValueDate);
00162         } catch (ParseException e) {
00163             //probably a computed date
00164             this.defaultValueDate = new ComputedDateValue(defaultValueDate);
00165         }
00166     }
00167 
00168     public void setDefaultValueDate(Date defaultValueDate) {
00169         this.defaultValueDate = defaultValueDate;
00170     }
00171 
00172     public Boolean getDefaultValueBoolean() {
00173         return defaultValueBoolean;
00174     }
00175 
00176     public void setDefaultValueBoolean(Boolean defaultValueBoolean) {
00177         this.defaultValueBoolean = defaultValueBoolean;
00178     }
00179 
00180     public Object getDefaultValueObject() {
00181         if (getDefaultValue() != null) {
00182             return getDefaultValue();
00183         } else if (getDefaultValueBoolean() != null) {
00184             return getDefaultValueBoolean();
00185         } else if (getDefaultValueNumeric() != null) {
00186             return getDefaultValueNumeric();
00187         } else if (getDefaultValueDate() != null) {
00188             return getDefaultValueDate();
00189         }
00190         return null;
00191     }
00192 
00193     public ConstraintsConfig getConstraints() {
00194         return constraints;
00195     }
00196 
00197     public void setConstraints(ConstraintsConfig constraints) {
00198         this.constraints = constraints;
00199     }
00200 
00201     public Boolean isAutoIncrement() {
00202         return autoIncrement;
00203     }
00204 
00205     public void setAutoIncrement(Boolean autoIncrement) {
00206         this.autoIncrement = autoIncrement;
00207     }

00209     public Element createNode(Document document) {
00210         Element element = document.createElement("column");
00211         element.setAttribute("name", getName());
00212         if (getType() != null) {
00213             element.setAttribute("type", getType());
00214         }
00215 
00216         if (getDefaultValue() != null) {
00217             element.setAttribute("defaultValue", getDefaultValue());
00218         }
00219         if (getDefaultValueNumeric() != null) {
00220             element.setAttribute("defaultValueNumeric", getDefaultValueNumeric().toString());
00221         }
00222         if (getDefaultValueDate() != null) {
00223             element.setAttribute("defaultValueDate", new ISODateFormat().format(getDefaultValueDate()));
00224         }
00225         if (getDefaultValueBoolean() != null) {
00226             element.setAttribute("defaultValueBoolean", getDefaultValueBoolean().toString());
00227         }
00228 
00229         if (getValue() != null) {
00230             element.setAttribute("value", getValue());
00231         }
00232         if (getValueNumeric() != null) {
00233             element.setAttribute("valueNumeric", getValueNumeric().toString());
00234         }
00235         if (getValueBoolean() != null) {
00236             element.setAttribute("valueBoolean", getValueBoolean().toString());
00237         }
00238         if (getValueDate() != null) {
00239             element.setAttribute("valueDate", new ISODateFormat().format(getValueDate()));
00240         }
00241 
00242         if (isAutoIncrement() != null && isAutoIncrement()) {
00243             element.setAttribute("autoIncrement", "true");
00244         }
00245 
00246         ConstraintsConfig constraints = getConstraints();
00247         if (constraints != null) {
00248             Element constraintsElement = document.createElement("constraints");
00249             if (constraints.getCheck() != null) {
00250                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("check", constraints.getCheck());
00251             }
00252             if (constraints.getForeignKeyName() != null) {
00253                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("foreignKeyName", constraints.getForeignKeyName());
00254             }
00255             if (constraints.getReferences() != null) {
00256                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("references", constraints.getReferences());
00257             }
00258             if (constraints.isDeferrable() != null) {
00259                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("deferrable", constraints.isDeferrable().toString());
00260             }
00261             if (constraints.isDeleteCascade() != null) {
00262                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("deleteCascade", constraints.isDeleteCascade().toString());
00263             }
00264             if (constraints.isInitiallyDeferred() != null) {
00265                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("initiallyDeferred", constraints.isInitiallyDeferred().toString());
00266             }
00267             if (constraints.isNullable() != null) {
00268                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("nullable", constraints.isNullable().toString());
00269             }
00270             if (constraints.isPrimaryKey() != null) {
00271                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("primaryKey", constraints.isPrimaryKey().toString());
00272             }
00273             if (constraints.isUnique() != null) {
00274                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("unique", constraints.isUnique().toString());
00275             }
00276 
00277             if (constraints.getUniqueConstraintName() != null) {
00278                 constraintsElement.setAttribute("uniqueConstraintName", constraints.getUniqueConstraintName());
00279             }
00280             element.appendChild(constraintsElement);
00281         }
00282 
00283         return element;
00284     }
00285 
00286     public String getDefaultColumnValue(Database database) {
00287         if (this.getDefaultValue() != null) {
00288             if ("null".equalsIgnoreCase(this.getDefaultValue())) {
00289                 return "NULL";
00290             }
00291             if (!database.shouldQuoteValue(this.getDefaultValue())) {
00292                 return this.getDefaultValue();
00293             } else {
00294                 return "'" + this.getDefaultValue().replaceAll("'", "''") + "'";
00295             }
00296         } else if (this.getDefaultValueNumeric() != null) {
00297             return this.getDefaultValueNumeric().toString();
00298         } else if (this.getDefaultValueBoolean() != null) {
00299             String returnValue;
00300             if (this.getDefaultValueBoolean()) {
00301                 returnValue = database.getTrueBooleanValue();
00302             } else {
00303                 returnValue = database.getFalseBooleanValue();
00304             }
00305 
00306             if (returnValue.matches("\\d+")) {
00307                 return returnValue;
00308             } else {
00309                 return "'" + returnValue + "'";
00310             }
00311         } else if (this.getDefaultValueDate() != null) {
00312             Date defaultDateValue = this.getDefaultValueDate();
00313             return database.getDateLiteral(defaultDateValue);
00314         } else {
00315             return "NULL";
00316         }
00317     }
00318 
00319     public boolean hasDefaultValue() {
00320         return this.getDefaultValue() != null
00321                 || this.getDefaultValueBoolean() != null
00322                 || this.getDefaultValueDate() != null
00323                 || this.getDefaultValueNumeric() != null;
00324     }
00325
